1 - How to place your ships?

  • The ships are placed with drag and drop functionality. Hold the highlited rotating ship and drag to the gameboard than has your name above, drop where you want to place the ship.
  • When you place all your 5 ships, the ships container will disapear.

2 - How to attack your opponent?

  • Click the computer gameboard. After that attack, the computer will attack. Wait your turn.

Colors:

  • Grey: Ship
  • White: Water hit
  • Red: Ship hit
  • Black: Ship sunk
